Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails and calendar for any urgent updates. Respond to any pending messages from the previous week. Catch up on relevant news articles on data analysis and healthcare trends.
Review the current progress of the influenza trend analysis report template. Identify specific areas for improvement based on initial design specifications.

Brainstorm potential data visualization elements for the influenza trend analysis report. Consider different chart types (line, bar, scatter plots) and their suitability for displaying trends over time.
Begin developing the data visualization components in the report template. Start with the line chart to illustrate the overall influenza case trends over the past seasons.
Implement interactive elements in the line chart, such as tooltips that display specific data points upon hovering. Ensure the chart is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes.
Lunch Break - Review statistical analysis methods for understanding the spread of influenza.
Continue working on data visualization by creating a bar chart to compare influenza cases across different age groups. Focus on clear labeling and a color scheme that enhances readability.
Research best practices for data visualization in healthcare reports. Look for examples of effective dashboards and interactive reports to gather inspiration.
Document the data visualization choices and the rationale behind them. Prepare a short presentation to showcase the progress and solicit feedback from stakeholders.
Backup all the files and prepare to leave office.
